paper_abstract: For each d > 0, we find all the smallest fullerenes for which the least distance between two pentagons is d. We also show that for each d there is an h(d) such that fullerenes with pentagons at least distance d apart and any number of hexagons greater than or equal to h(d) exist. We also determine the number of fullerenes where the minimum distance between any two pentagons is at least d, for 1 <= d <= 5, up to 400 vertices.
